title: Escape from the confines of Rorahgal XIV (Fan-ficion)
content:
No, this is not the first fan-fiction I promised: This is something Gallexretter had me whip up for him. He gave me the title, and the first paragraph, and I continued the story. I hope you like it!

[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img]

I am hosting it on my site, and will notify you of any updates I make.

[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-wink.gif[/img]

Enjoy!!!

Edit: [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-embarrassed.gif[/img] - Yeah... you can read it [url=http://www.najawa.com/ck/fan-fiction]here![/url]Tough Guys Can Fix Their Own Problems!!!
[img]http://i15.photobucket.com/albums/a371/najawa/Modding/Prisoner.jpg[/img]

Visit My site at [url=http://www.najawa.com]www.najawa.com[/url]

-- NAJAWA --

title: Re: Escape from the confines of Rorahgal XIV (Fan-ficion)
content: Um, exactly where? If it isn't ready you wouldn't have needed to inform us about it yet.Eat your veggies!

title: Re: Escape from the confines of Rorahgal XIV (Fan-ficion)
content:
Ah Gal, a well meaning gesture.

Better than your previous attempt; and actually understandable, putting it aove a lot of fanfiction that has been spawned here. If this style keeps up it could be quite a piece of work. Stay Keen!A proud member of the Spleen Extinction society

[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/rcwn.png[/img]

"No one should be here."
-Levellord
